text:
An error occurs while TinyMCE is loaded. Because of this, the standard TinyMCE image upload dialog is displayed instead of the Lenya one.

editor_plugin.js, line 18:

tinyMCE.importPluginLanguagePack('simplebrowser', 'en');


TinyMCE version: 3.2.3.1
creator: andreas@apache.org
ragaller@apache.org
text: This is IMO due to the fact, that our tinyMCE plugin is incompatible with the 3.x versions of tinyMCE
OK, this is not a bug.
creator: andreas@apache.org
